titles.title: Oh The Bitter Shame And Sorrow (easy very nice

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh the bitter shame and sorrow That a time could ever be When I let the Saviour's pity Plead in vain and proudly answered 'All of self and none of Thee All of self and none of Thee'{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yet He found me I beheld Him Bleeding on the cursed tree Heard Him pray 'Forgive them Father' And my wistful heart said faintly 'Some of self and some of Thee Some of self and some of Thee'{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Day by day His tender mercy Healing helping full and free Sweet and strong and ah so patient Brought me lower while I whispered 'Less of self and more of Thee Less of self and more of Thee'{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Higher than the highest heavens Deeper than the deepest sea Lord Thy love at last hath conquered Grant me now my souls petition 'None of self and all of Thee None of self and all of Thee'{/lang-eng}
